name: Windows Defender
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING!

Defend against Clippy in this PS1-style shooter, where you sacrifice visual clarity for power!

Looks like this copy of Windows is having some issues. As (a) Windows Defender, you must hold off the evil Clippys as long as you can!

Use power-up orbs to become more powerful- but be warned, you'll have to deal with infections.

Survive as long as possible!

The Windows XP sounds and icons belong to Microsoft, as well as the Bliss image.

NOTE: This game is in a rather dubious position copyright-wise (uses Windows XP sounds and icons), so I'll likely add a copyright-OK version soon.
